select a.WOT_ID,a.USER_ID,b.USER_NAME as USER_ID_NAME,a.WOT_DATE,a.WOT_PARTICIPANT,a.WOT_PLACE,a.WOT_DESC, concat(a.WOT_TIME,d.CODE_NAME) as WOT_TIME,a.WOT_APPROVER, c.USER_NAME as WOT_APPROVER_NAME, a.WOT_APP_TIME,a.APP_RESULT,a.WOT_APP_OPINION,a.WOT_OVERTIME_DATE,a.STATE from hr_work_overtime a join security_user b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join security_user c on a.WOT_APPROVER=c.USER_ID left join sys_codelist d on a.WOT_TIME_COMPANY = d.CODE_ID where 1=1 and d.TYPE_ID = 'WOT_TIME_COMPANY'
and WOT_OVERTIME_DATE >= #sdate#
and WOT_OVERTIME_DATE <= #edate#
and b.USER_ID = #currentUserId#
and b.USER_NAME like #userName_like#
and STATE = #STATE#
order by WOT_OVERTIME_DATE desc,b.USER_CODE

select a.WOT_ID,a.USER_ID,b.USER_NAME as USER_ID_NAME,a.WOT_DATE,a.WOT_PARTICIPANT,a.WOT_PLACE,a.WOT_DESC,a.WOT_TIME,WOT_TIME_COMPANY,a.WOT_APPROVER,c.USER_NAME as WOT_APPROVER_NAME,a.WOT_APP_TIME,a.APP_RESULT,a.WOT_APP_OPINION,a.WOT_OVERTIME_DATE,a.STATE from hr_work_overtime a join security_user b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join security_user c on a.WOT_APPROVER=c.USER_ID where 1=1
WOT_DATE=#currentDate#
WOT_ID=#WOT_ID#

select a.WOT_ID,a.USER_ID,b.USER_NAME as USER_ID_NAME,a.WOT_DATE,a.WOT_PARTICIPANT,a.WOT_PLACE,a.WOT_DESC,a.WOT_TIME,WOT_TIME_COMPANY,a.WOT_APPROVER,c.USER_NAME as WOT_APPROVER_NAME,a.WOT_APP_TIME,a.APP_RESULT,a.WOT_APP_OPINION,a.WOT_OVERTIME_DATE,a.STATE from hr_work_overtime a join security_user b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join security_user c on a.WOT_APPROVER=c.USER_ID where 1=1
WOT_DATE=#wotDate#
b.USER_ID=#currentUser#
WOT_ID=#WOT_ID#
sqlMap.update: update hr_work_overtime set WOT_APPROVER=#WOT_APPROVER:CHAR#, WOT_APP_TIME=#WOT_APP_TIME:DATE#, APP_RESULT=#APP_RESULT:VARCHAR#, WOT_APP_OPINION=#WOT_APP_OPINION:VARCHAR#, STATE=#STATE:VARCHAR# where WOT_ID=#WOT_ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT WOT_ID,WOT_PLACE,WOT_TIME,d.CODE_NAME as WOT_TIME_COMPANY,WOT_OVERTIME_DATE,c.CODE_NAME as STATE FROM hr_work_overtime a left join security_user b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID left join sys_codelist c on a.STATE = c.CODE_ID left join sys_codelist d on a.WOT_TIME_COMPANY = d.CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 and b.USER_CODE = #userCode# and c.TYPE_ID = 'STATE' and d.TYPE_ID = 'WOT_TIME_COMPANY' order by WOT_OVERTIME_DATE desc
sqlMap.update: update hr_work_overtime set STATE=#STATE:VARCHAR# where WOT_ID=#WOT_ID#
